Quickstrike:





Quickstrike felt stupid. He had to ask for help to get a blanket off. "Ah'm 
fine," he said. He looked to the outside of the base. It was morning now. He 
looked back at Stingtra. "Ah want e'veryone t' say inside. Well, ya can go 
outside, but...don't go past th' aut-guns' scanners. Hear?" He addressed it 
to everyone in the cave. He knew there were too few to go out risking their 
lives because someone wanted to go out exploring.
